Class FileSerializer

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Indexer<NamedFields>

    public class FileSerializer
extends SynchIndexer<NamedFields,File>
    Basic Indexer implementation that writes object content to timestamped files on disk.
    Author:
    ajs6f, Esm√© Cowles
